title: Stranger Things
synopsis: When a young boy vanishes, a small town uncovers a mystery involving secret experiments, terrifying supernatural forces and one strange little girl.
cast: Winona Ryder, David Harbour, Finn Wolfhard

episodes.title: Chapter One: The Vanishing Of Will Byers
episodes.synopsis: On his way home from a friend's house, young Will sees something terrifying. Nearby, a sinister secret lurks in the depths of a government lab.

episodes.title: Chapter Two: The Weirdo on Maple Street
episodes.synopsis: Lucas, Mike and Dustin try to talk to the girl they found in the woods. Hopper questions an anxious Joyce about an unsettling phone call.

episodes.title: Chapter Three: Holly, Jolly
episodes.synopsis: An increasingly concerned Nancy looks for Barb and finds out what Jonathan's been up to. Joyce is convinced Will is trying to talk to her.

episodes.title: Chapter Four: The Body
episodes.synopsis: Refusing to believe Will is dead, Joyce tries to connect with her son. The boys give Eleven a makeover. Nancy and Jonathan form an unlikely alliance.

episodes.title: Chapter Five: The Flea and the Acrobat
episodes.synopsis: Hopper breaks into the lab while Nancy and Jonathan confront the force that took Will. The boys ask Mr. Clarke how to travel to another dimension.

episodes.title: Chapter Six: The Monster
episodes.synopsis: A frantic Jonathan looks for Nancy in the darkness, but Steve's looking for her, too. Hopper and Joyce uncover the truth about the lab's experiments.

episodes.title: Chapter Seven: The Bathtub
episodes.synopsis: Eleven struggles to reach Will, while Lucas warns that "the bad men are coming." Nancy and Jonathan show the police what Jonathan caught on camera.

episodes.title: Chapter Eight: The Upside Down
episodes.synopsis: Dr. Brenner holds Hopper and Joyce for questioning while the boys wait with Eleven in the gym. Back at Will's, Nancy and Jonathan prepare for battle.
